description_mapping.summary_rapids_maxsumsteps: Maximum daily step count across all monitoring period
description_mapping.summary_rapids_minsumsteps: Minimum daily step count across all monitoring period
description_mapping.summary_rapids_avgsumsteps: Average daily step count across all monitoring period
description_mapping.summary_rapids_mediansumsteps: Median daily step count across all monitoring period
description_mapping.summary_rapids_stdsumsteps: Standard deviation of daily step counts across all monitoring period
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_sumsteps: Total step count for the day
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_maxsteps: Maximum step count in a single time segment
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_minsteps: Minimum step count in a single time segment
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_avgsteps: Average step count per time segment
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_stdsteps: Standard deviation of step counts across time segments
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_countepisodesedentarybou: Number of sedentary episodes (continuous periods with step count < threshold)
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_sumdurationsedentarybout: Total duration of all sedentary episodes in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_maxdurationsedentarybout: Maximum duration of a single sedentary episode in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_mindurationsedentarybout: Minimum duration of a single sedentary episode in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_avgdurationsedentarybout: Average duration of sedentary episodes in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_stddurationsedentarybout: Standard deviation of sedentary episode durations in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_countepisodeactivebout: Number of active episodes (continuous periods with step count >= threshold)
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_sumdurationactivebout: Total duration of all active episodes in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_maxdurationactivebout: Maximum duration of a single active episode in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_mindurationactivebout: Minimum duration of a single active episode in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_avgdurationactivebout: Average duration of active episodes in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_stddurationactivebout: Standard deviation of active episode durations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_missed_count: Number of missed calls during the time segment
description_mapping.rapids_missed_distinctcontacts: Number of distinct contacts associated with missed calls
description_mapping.rapids_missed_timefirstcall: Time in minutes from midnight to the first missed call
description_mapping.rapids_missed_timelastcall: Time in minutes from midnight to the last missed call
description_mapping.rapids_missed_countmostfrequentcontact: Number of missed calls from the most frequent contact
description_mapping.rapids_incoming_count: Number of incoming calls during the time segment
description_mapping.rapids_incoming_distinctcontacts: Number of distinct contacts associated with incoming calls
description_mapping.rapids_incoming_meanduration: Mean duration of all incoming calls in seconds
description_mapping.rapids_incoming_sumduration: Sum duration of all incoming calls in seconds
description_mapping.rapids_incoming_minduration: Duration of the shortest incoming call in seconds
description_mapping.rapids_incoming_maxduration: Duration of the longest incoming call in seconds
description_mapping.rapids_incoming_stdduration: Standard deviation of incoming call durations in seconds
description_mapping.rapids_incoming_modeduration: Mode duration of all incoming calls in seconds
description_mapping.rapids_incoming_entropyduration: Shannon entropy estimate for incoming call durations in nats
description_mapping.rapids_incoming_timefirstcall: Time in minutes from midnight to the first incoming call
description_mapping.rapids_incoming_timelastcall: Time in minutes from midnight to the last incoming call
description_mapping.rapids_incoming_countmostfrequentcontact: Number of incoming calls from the most frequent contact
description_mapping.rapids_outgoing_count: Number of outgoing calls during the time segment
description_mapping.rapids_outgoing_distinctcontacts: Number of distinct contacts associated with outgoing calls
description_mapping.rapids_outgoing_meanduration: Mean duration of all outgoing calls in seconds
description_mapping.rapids_outgoing_sumduration: Sum duration of all outgoing calls in seconds
description_mapping.rapids_outgoing_minduration: Duration of the shortest outgoing call in seconds
description_mapping.rapids_outgoing_maxduration: Duration of the longest outgoing call in seconds
description_mapping.rapids_outgoing_stdduration: Standard deviation of outgoing call durations in seconds
description_mapping.rapids_outgoing_modeduration: Mode duration of all outgoing calls in seconds
description_mapping.rapids_outgoing_entropyduration: Shannon entropy estimate for outgoing call durations in nats
description_mapping.rapids_outgoing_timefirstcall: Time in minutes from midnight to the first outgoing call
description_mapping.rapids_outgoing_timelastcall: Time in minutes from midnight to the last outgoing call
description_mapping.rapids_outgoing_countmostfrequentcontact: Number of outgoing calls to the most frequent contact
description_mapping.rapids_countscans: Number of Bluetooth scans (rows) from devices sensed during time segment
description_mapping.rapids_uniquedevices: Number of unique Bluetooth devices sensed, identified by hardware addresses
description_mapping.rapids_countscansmostuniquedevice: Number of scans from the most frequently scanned device
description_mapping.doryab_countscansall: Number of scans from all Bluetooth devices (own + others)
description_mapping.doryab_uniquedevicesall: Number of unique devices sensed (own + others)
description_mapping.doryab_meanscansall: Mean number of scans per device (own + others)
description_mapping.doryab_stdscansall: Standard deviation of scans per device (own + others)
description_mapping.doryab_countscansmostfrequentdevicewithi: Scans from most frequent device within this segment (all)
description_mapping.doryab_countscansmostfrequentdeviceacros: Scans from most frequent device across all segments (all)
Scans from most frequent device across entire dataset (all)
description_mapping.doryab_countscansleastfrequentdevicewith: Scans from least frequent device within this segment (all)
description_mapping.doryab_countscansleastfrequentdeviceacro: Scans from least frequent device across all segments (all)
Scans from least frequent device across entire dataset (all)
description_mapping.doryab_countscansown: Number of scans from participant's own Bluetooth devices
description_mapping.doryab_uniquedevicesown: Number of unique devices belonging to participant
description_mapping.doryab_meanscansown: Mean number of scans per own device
description_mapping.doryab_stdscansown: Standard deviation of scans per own device
description_mapping.doryab_countscansmostfrequentdevicewithi: Scans from most frequent own device within segment
description_mapping.doryab_countscansmostfrequentdeviceacros: Scans from most frequent own device across segments
Scans from most frequent own device across dataset
description_mapping.doryab_countscansleastfrequentdevicewith: Scans from least frequent own device within segment
description_mapping.doryab_countscansleastfrequentdeviceacro: Scans from least frequent own device across segments
Scans from least frequent own device across dataset
description_mapping.doryab_countscansothers: Number of scans from other people's Bluetooth devices
description_mapping.doryab_uniquedevicesothers: Number of unique devices belonging to others
description_mapping.doryab_meanscansothers: Mean number of scans per others' device
description_mapping.doryab_stdscansothers: Standard deviation of scans per others' device
description_mapping.doryab_countscansmostfrequentdevicewithi: Scans from most frequent others' device within segment
description_mapping.doryab_countscansmostfrequentdeviceacros: Scans from most frequent others' device across segments
Scans from most frequent others' device across dataset
description_mapping.doryab_countscansleastfrequentdevicewith: Scans from least frequent others' device within segment
description_mapping.doryab_countscansleastfrequentdeviceacro: Scans from least frequent others' device across segments
Scans from least frequent others' device across dataset
description_mapping.connected_rapids_countscans: Number of scans when device was connected to network
description_mapping.connected_rapids_uniquedevices: Number of unique devices when connected to network
description_mapping.connected_rapids_countscansmostuniquedev: Scans from most unique device when connected
description_mapping.barnett_avgflightdur: Mean duration of all flights (movement episodes) in seconds
description_mapping.barnett_avgflightlen: Mean length of all flights (movement episodes) in meters
description_mapping.barnett_circdnrtn: Circadian routine measure (0-1): 0=completely different routine, 1=same routine every day
description_mapping.barnett_disttravelled: Total distance traveled over the day in meters (sum of all flights)
description_mapping.barnett_hometime: Time spent at home in minutes. Home is most visited location between 8pm-8am within 200m radius
description_mapping.barnett_maxdiam: Maximum diameter: largest distance between any two pauses in meters
description_mapping.barnett_maxhomedist: Maximum distance from home location in meters
description_mapping.barnett_probpause: Fraction of day spent in pauses (stationary periods) vs flights (movement)
description_mapping.barnett_rog: Radius of Gyration: area coverage measure in meters, weighted distance from centroid of all visited places
description_mapping.barnett_siglocentropy: Shannon entropy based on time spent at each significant location in nats
description_mapping.barnett_siglocsvisited: Number of significant locations visited (found using k-means clustering, k=1-200, min 400m apart)
description_mapping.barnett_stdflightdur: Standard deviation of flight (movement episode) durations in seconds
description_mapping.barnett_stdflightlen: Standard deviation of flight (movement episode) lengths in meters
description_mapping.barnett_wkenddayrtn: Weekend vs weekday routine difference (same as circdnrtn but computed separately)
description_mapping.doryab_avglengthstayatclusters: Average time spent at significant locations (clusters) in minutes
description_mapping.doryab_avgspeed: Average speed during movement periods in km/hr (0 when stationary)
description_mapping.doryab_homelabel: Label identifier for home location cluster
description_mapping.doryab_locationentropy: Shannon entropy over time spent at each significant location cluster in nats
description_mapping.doryab_locationvariance: Sum of variances of latitude and longitude coordinates in meters²
description_mapping.doryab_loglocationvariance: Log of the sum of variances of latitude and longitude coordinates
description_mapping.doryab_maxlengthstayatclusters: Maximum time spent at any significant location in minutes
description_mapping.doryab_minlengthstayatclusters: Minimum time spent at any significant location in minutes
description_mapping.doryab_movingtostaticratio: Ratio of stationary time to total location sensing time (higher=more stationary)
description_mapping.doryab_normalizedlocationentropy: Shannon entropy of location clusters divided by number of clusters in nats
description_mapping.doryab_numberlocationtransitions: Number of movements between different significant location clusters
description_mapping.doryab_numberofsignificantplaces: Number of significant places identified using DBSCAN/OPTICS clustering
description_mapping.doryab_outlierstimepercent: Ratio of time in non-significant clusters to total cluster time
description_mapping.doryab_radiusgyration: Area coverage quantification: weighted distance from centroid in meters
description_mapping.doryab_stdlengthstayatclusters: Standard deviation of time spent at significant locations in minutes
description_mapping.doryab_timeathome: Time spent at home location in minutes
description_mapping.doryab_timeattop1location: Time spent at the most visited significant location in minutes
description_mapping.doryab_timeattop2location: Time spent at the 2nd most visited significant location in minutes
description_mapping.doryab_timeattop3location: Time spent at the 3rd most visited significant location in minutes
description_mapping.doryab_totaldistance: Total distance traveled using haversine formula in meters
description_mapping.doryab_varspeed: Speed variance during movement periods in km/hr (0 when stationary)
description_mapping.locmap_duration_in_locmap_study: Time spent at study locations in minutes
description_mapping.locmap_percent_in_locmap_study: Percentage of day spent at study locations
description_mapping.locmap_duration_in_locmap_exercise: Time spent at exercise locations in minutes
description_mapping.locmap_percent_in_locmap_exercise: Percentage of day spent at exercise locations
description_mapping.locmap_duration_in_locmap_greens: Time spent at green/nature locations in minutes
description_mapping.locmap_percent_in_locmap_greens: Percentage of day spent at green/nature locations
description_mapping.rapids_countepisodeunlock: Total number of phone unlock episodes during the day
description_mapping.rapids_sumdurationunlock: Total duration of all phone unlock episodes in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_maxdurationunlock: Longest duration of any single phone unlock episode in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_mindurationunlock: Shortest duration of any single phone unlock episode in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_avgdurationunlock: Average duration of phone unlock episodes in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_stddurationunlock: Standard deviation of phone unlock episode durations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_firstuseafter00unlock: Minutes from midnight until first phone unlock episode
description_mapping.rapids_countepisodeunlock_locmap_exercis: Number of phone unlock episodes at exercise locations
description_mapping.rapids_sumdurationunlock_locmap_exercise: Total phone usage duration at exercise locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_maxdurationunlock_locmap_exercise: Longest phone usage at exercise locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_mindurationunlock_locmap_exercise: Shortest phone usage at exercise locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_avgdurationunlock_locmap_exercise: Average phone usage duration at exercise locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_stddurationunlock_locmap_exercise: Standard deviation of phone usage at exercise locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_firstuseafter00unlock_locmap_exer: Minutes until first phone use at exercise locations
description_mapping.rapids_countepisodeunlock_locmap_greens: Number of phone unlock episodes at green/nature locations
description_mapping.rapids_sumdurationunlock_locmap_greens: Total phone usage duration at green/nature locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_maxdurationunlock_locmap_greens: Longest phone usage at green/nature locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_mindurationunlock_locmap_greens: Shortest phone usage at green/nature locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_avgdurationunlock_locmap_greens: Average phone usage duration at green/nature locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_stddurationunlock_locmap_greens: Standard deviation of phone usage at green/nature locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_firstuseafter00unlock_locmap_gree: Minutes until first phone use at green/nature locations
description_mapping.rapids_countepisodeunlock_locmap_living: Number of phone unlock episodes at living/home locations
description_mapping.rapids_sumdurationunlock_locmap_living: Total phone usage duration at living/home locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_maxdurationunlock_locmap_living: Longest phone usage at living/home locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_mindurationunlock_locmap_living: Shortest phone usage at living/home locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_avgdurationunlock_locmap_living: Average phone usage duration at living/home locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_stddurationunlock_locmap_living: Standard deviation of phone usage at living/home locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_firstuseafter00unlock_locmap_livi: Minutes until first phone use at living/home locations
description_mapping.rapids_countepisodeunlock_locmap_study: Number of phone unlock episodes at study locations
description_mapping.rapids_sumdurationunlock_locmap_study: Total phone usage duration at study locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_maxdurationunlock_locmap_study: Longest phone usage at study locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_mindurationunlock_locmap_study: Shortest phone usage at study locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_avgdurationunlock_locmap_study: Average phone usage duration at study locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_stddurationunlock_locmap_study: Standard deviation of phone usage at study locations in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_firstuseafter00unlock_locmap_stud: Minutes until first phone use at study locations
description_mapping.rapids_countepisodeunlock_locmap_home: Number of phone unlock episodes at home location
description_mapping.rapids_sumdurationunlock_locmap_home: Total phone usage duration at home location in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_maxdurationunlock_locmap_home: Longest phone usage at home location in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_mindurationunlock_locmap_home: Shortest phone usage at home location in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_avgdurationunlock_locmap_home: Average phone usage duration at home location in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_stddurationunlock_locmap_home: Standard deviation of phone usage at home location in minutes
description_mapping.rapids_firstuseafter00unlock_locmap_home: Minutes until first phone use at home location
description_mapping.summary_rapids_sumdurationafterwakeupmai: Total time after wakeup in main sleep episode in minutes
description_mapping.summary_rapids_sumdurationasleepmain: Total sleep duration in main sleep episode in minutes
description_mapping.summary_rapids_sumdurationawakemain: Total time awake during main sleep episode in minutes
description_mapping.summary_rapids_sumdurationtofallasleepma: Total time to fall asleep in main sleep episode in minutes
description_mapping.summary_rapids_sumdurationinbedmain: Total time in bed for main sleep episode in minutes
description_mapping.summary_rapids_avgefficiencymain: Average sleep efficiency of main sleep episode (sleep time / time in bed)
description_mapping.summary_rapids_avgdurationafterwakeupmai: Average time after wakeup in main sleep episode in minutes
description_mapping.summary_rapids_avgdurationasleepmain: Average sleep duration in main sleep episode in minutes
description_mapping.summary_rapids_avgdurationawakemain: Average time awake during main sleep episode in minutes
description_mapping.summary_rapids_avgdurationtofallasleepma: Average time to fall asleep in main sleep episode in minutes
description_mapping.summary_rapids_avgdurationinbedmain: Average time in bed for main sleep episode in minutes
description_mapping.summary_rapids_firstbedtimemain: Time of first bedtime in main sleep episode (minutes from midnight)
description_mapping.summary_rapids_lastbedtimemain: Time of last bedtime in main sleep episode (minutes from midnight)
description_mapping.summary_rapids_firstwaketimemain: Time of first wake in main sleep episode (minutes from midnight)
description_mapping.summary_rapids_lastwaketimemain: Time of last wake in main sleep episode (minutes from midnight)
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_avgdurationasleepunified: Average duration of unified asleep periods in main episode in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_avgdurationawakeunifiedm: Average duration of unified awake periods in main episode in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_maxdurationasleepunified: Maximum duration of unified asleep period in main episode in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_maxdurationawakeunifiedm: Maximum duration of unified awake period in main episode in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_sumdurationasleepunified: Total duration of unified asleep periods in main episode in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_sumdurationawakeunifiedm: Total duration of unified awake periods in main episode in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_countepisodeasleepunifie: Number of unified asleep episodes in main sleep period
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_countepisodeawakeunified: Number of unified awake episodes in main sleep period
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_stddurationasleepunified: Standard deviation of unified asleep episode durations in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_stddurationawakeunifiedm: Standard deviation of unified awake episode durations in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_mindurationasleepunified: Minimum duration of unified asleep episode in main period in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_mindurationawakeunifiedm: Minimum duration of unified awake episode in main period in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_mediandurationasleepunif: Median duration of unified asleep episodes in main period in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_mediandurationawakeunifi: Median duration of unified awake episodes in main period in minutes
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_ratiocountasleepunifiedw: Ratio of asleep episode count to total episodes within main sleep
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_ratiocountawakeunifiedwi: Ratio of awake episode count to total episodes within main sleep
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_ratiodurationasleepunifi: Ratio of asleep duration to total duration within main sleep
description_mapping.intraday_rapids_ratiodurationawakeunifie: Ratio of awake duration to total duration within main sleep
